aliasOf.description: The unique identifier of the parent record this record is an alias of.

applicationUniqueFlag.description: Whether this term is unique to a particular application.

namespace.description: The namespace to use in combination with the UniqueID to construct a URI that refers to the record.

notes.description: Any additional information associated with this record.

permanency.description: An indication of how likely a field is to change over time.

ulUri.description: A URI which can be used to look up this record in the Unified Listing.

status.description: The review status of this record.

defaultValue.description: The suggested default value of this preference.

termLabel.description: A short label for this term as it would appear in a menu or listing.

translationOf.description: The unique identifier of the parent record this record is a translation of.

type.description: The type of record, i.e. term, alias, translation, transform, condition.

uniqueId.description: A completely unique identifier for this record.

updated.description: The date at which the record was last updated.

uses.description: A description of other systems that use this term and how they use it.

valueSpace.description: A description of the values allowed for this term.
